text: Popular for their thunder tea rice. I also enjoyed fried olive rice too (using Chinese-style fermented olive vege). Cooking is done within the same space with absent ventilation. Ordering has to be done online even though there were no other customers when we arrived for an early lunch

Since we were in the vicinity of AnchorPoint on March 1, we decided to dine at Sunnychoice Vegan Cafe. We ordered a bowl of Lei Cha, a plate of dry Mee Siam, a plate of veggie sushi, and a glass each of iced lemongrass and Roselle. The food was deliciously prepared, and most importantly, there was no aftertaste of thirst after dining. We noticed that the cook had been transferred from another branch, and we would be happy to visit this cafe again to enjoy her cooking. Additionally, this shop accepts CDC vouchers, which is a plus. Thumbs up!

We love the food!!
Buy your main and the drink or dessert half price.
Yummy delicious food that vegetarian.
Friendly chef and homely atmosphere. The food was delicious. The assam fish has a nice strong sour taste.

Definitely try the assam fish.
There is 50% off drink with very main course ordered
Cons is that the QR code ordering requires u to register. Should have an option for guest ordering
